name:
Re-Imagine Showcase
Admission Ticket
description: Beats Rhymes and Life, Inc. proudly presents, RE-IMAGINE: A Winter Showcase 2013. This winter’s showcase is entitled, “RE-IMAGINE” because our youth have spent the last 20 weeks re-imagining life for themselves, their families and community. We invite you to share in this epic night with promises to be nothing short of inspiring. Doors open at 5:00 pm for food and refreshments. Event starts at 5:30 pm and concludes at 8:00 pm. This is event is all ages and youth friendly. Only 150 of the 350 seats will be available for public purchase. Your purchase will be available at Will Call the night of the showcase. For more information on this event visit: http://brl-inc.org/reimagine *All proceeds from Re-imagine swag go to cover expenses to produce the showcase.

name:
Re-imagine All-Star Pack
Package Includes:
(1) T-Shirt
(1) Admission Ticket
Button Set
description: Be a BRL All-Star and purchase your ticket to the "Re-imagin Winter Showcase" along with your limited edition commemorative T-Shirt and Buttons. This is a special online offer. Re-imagine t-shirts will be available for purchase during the showcase for $25. Your purchase will be available at Will Call the night of the showcase. *All proceeds from Re-imagine swag go to cover expenses to produce the showcase.

name: Golden State of Rhyme T-Shirt (Blue - Limited Edition)
description: An idea gift for the MC in your life. California is known as 'The Golden State', BRL Art Director Lexx Valdez puts a new twists on a familiar image in this witty shirt.

name: Men's BRL Logo T-Shirt (Black Shirt / Orange & Purple / Grey Ink)
description:
Classic BRL Logo T-Shirt made with quality American Apparel shirts in the branded BRL colors. The perfect holiday gift! 100% of proceeds from our store go to fund media projects for our youth programs. 

Photos by Tamara Orozco

Purchases over $100 will made tax deductible.

name: Golden State of Rhyme T-Shirt (White - Limited Edition)
description: An idea gift for the MC in your life. California is known as 'The Golden State', BRL Art Director Lexx Valdez puts a new twists on a familiar image in this witty shirt.

name: Women's BRL Logo T-Shirt (Black Shirt / Orange & Purple Ink)
description:
Classic BRL Logo T-Shirt made with quality American Apparel shirts in the branded BRL colors. The perfect holiday gift! 100% of proceeds from our store go to fund media projects for our youth programs. 

Photos by Tamara Orozco

name:
940 Garrison Vol. 1
South Bronx BRL - Debut Album
description:
Hip Hop began in the South Bronx, New York. In 2010, BRL brought it's Rap Therapy program to the Boogie Down in an effort to return to the roots of Hip Hop. Based out the Point Community Development Center, BRL partnered with local youth and adults to produce our first South Bronx Album. This 6-track album is sure to be a classic. Get your copy today and support meaningful Hip Hop music created by some of the South Bronx most talented youth!

Purchase for digital download only.

LISTEN before you buy at: 
http://beatsrhymesandlife.bandcamp.com/

name:
S.W.A.G. - San Francisco BRL
Debut Album
description:
BRL is proud to present our San Francisco Rap Therapy program's debut album entitled S.W.A.G. (Survival Without Any Guilt). This amazing album features the voices of youth involved in the juvenile justice and foster care systems. This CD sheds light on the unique challenges these youth face as well as the S.W.A.G. they use to rise above adversity and reach new levels of independence. 

Purchase for digital download only.

LISTEN before you buy at: 
http://beatsrhymesandlife.bandcamp.com/

name:
It's a Teen Thang!
Compilation Album
description:
What happens when all of BRL's programs unite to raise awareness about teen pregnancy and other key issues effecting teen health? Great music, that's what! This compliation album features music from BRL youth from the communities of San Francisco, Oakland and Ashland. 

Purchase for digital download only.

LISTEN before you buy at: 
http://beatsrhymesandlife.bandcamp.com/

name:
Reaching for the Stars
Album
description:
Have you ever had a dream to reach for something that seemed impossible to attain? Join youth from our Oakland High Rap Therapy program as they take you on a journey to discover the power and potential from within. 

Purchase for digital download only.

LISTEN before you buy at: 
http://beatsrhymesandlife.bandcamp.com/

name:
Hip Hop's Next Generation - Berkeley BRL
Mixtape
description:
BRL got it's start at Berkeley High School. Originally pressed in 2008, Hip Hop's Next Generation was our first CD. Featuring songs from Berkeley teens, this album embodies a youthful spirit and passion for Hip Hop music and culture. An absolute for any BRL music collector.

Purchase for digital download only.

LISTEN before you buy at: 
http://beatsrhymesandlife.bandcamp.com/

name:
Tha Grand Entrance - Oakland BRL
Debut Album
description:
In 2009, an independent film crew chronicled the lives of nine BRL youth as they pass through our Oakland High Rap Therapy program. The result was a feature film on how youth in Oakland are finding positive ways to cope with adversity thru Hip Hop. Entitled, "A Lovely Day", the landmark film is set to premier in 2012. Tha Grand Entrance Album was created thru the process of making the film. This album marks BRL's first full-length album and continues to set the standard for all BRL music projects. 

Purchase for digital download only.

LISTEN before you buy at: 
http://beatsrhymesandlife.bandcamp.com/

LEARN MORE about A Lovely Day at:
http://www.brl-inc.org/alovelyday
